site_name: SAVE THEM ALL, LIFESAVERS RESCUE TRANSPORT

citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:22am on April
25, 2023.
Upon arrival, the registrant was contacted by phone, and prepared to meet the inspector at the facility. The registrant
called back later, stating they would not be able to arrive in time due to additional traffic delays.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:22am on April 
25, 2023. 
 
Upon arrival, the registrant was contacted by phone, and prepared to meet the inspector at the facility. The registrant 
called back later, stating they would not be able to arrive in time due to additional traffic delays. 
 
 
 
End Section
